info.author: PariahSoft LLC
info.description:
A simple on-disk flat file database for storing string key/value pairs.


ScaffyDB v1 File Format
-----------------------

MAGIC: "ScaffyDB01"

FOR EACH KEY:
    1. Key Hash   := 8 BYTES       (unsigned integer) [BIG ENDIAN]
    2. Value Size := 2 BYTES       (unsigned integer) [BIG ENDIAN]
    3. Value      := 0-65535 BYTES (string)
info.keywords: database flat file string key value store disk

info.name: ScaffyDB
info.summary: ScaffyDB - A Scaffy On-Disk Key/Value Store Database
info.html_description:
A simple on-disk flat file database for storing string key/value pairs.

ScaffyDB v1 File Format

MAGIC: “ScaffyDB01”

FOR EACH KEY:
  1. Key Hash := 8 BYTES (unsigned integer) [BIG ENDIAN]
  2. Value Size := 2 BYTES (unsigned integer) [BIG ENDIAN]
  3. Value := 0-65535 BYTES (string)
